attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is well documentated we are living in difficult economic times, however the government has done little to communicate a positive message. They even missed the opportunity to uses the Olympic success as a platform to promote positive values.

I urge the general public to get behind me to force the government to start a positive PR campaign rather than look dower and depressed in front of the camera which is the current strategy.

rejection.details: Your petition should be more specific.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
